name.ja: <ruby>冥<rt>めい</rt></ruby><ruby>跡<rt>せき</rt></ruby><ruby>祭<rt>さい</rt></ruby>の<ruby>準<rt>じゅん</rt></ruby><ruby>備<rt>び</rt></ruby>

effect.en: Excavate the top 4 cards of your Deck. You can add 1 excavated "Yorishiro of Isyria", "Monumenthes Festival -The Isyria Seance-", "Offering to Isyria", "Sarcophagus of Isyria", or "Spirit of Isyria" to your hand. Place the other cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.
